title: Client Froze When Someone Else Dodged And Gave Me A Second Dodge
body: Pretty much title: Client froze as someone else ran down the clock, and then eventually it just exited to the home page and gave me an error. I restarted client and it counted as a second dodge (my comp crashed for the first dodge, unrelated when i unplug a usb it blue screens and crashes)

replies.body: It's hard to say what is causing this issue based on your information, and could even be a combination of driver, hardware, or connection issues.  If you are getting a blue screen, it could indicate a hardware problem but I suggest making sure you[r drivers are updated ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)to be sure.  What was the full error that you received?  This could help pinpoint the problem!

Thanks for the response, i just updated all my drivers since you suggested it. 

It was directly after the patch roll out, and now i haven't seen it again, the error was unknown i think with the message to hit okay. Like an unknown error has occured or something like that. 

Hope that helps, since it hasn't recurred it's nothing to worry about.
